Package com.doa.engine.graphics

Class DoaAnimations

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.doa.engine.graphics.DoaAnimations
  • public final class DoaAnimations
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for providing a Factory to create Animations for DoaEngine to display. This class is static, therefore has no objects.
    Since:
    DoaEngine 2.2
    Version:
    2.5
    Author:
    Doga Oruc

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​DoaAnimation> ORIGINAL_ANIMATIONS
      Collection that maps animation names to animations.
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​DoaAnimation> SHADED_ANIMATIONS
      Collection that maps animation names to animations that are shaded according to the lights the scene has.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static DoaAnimation createAnimation​(java.lang.String animationName, java.lang.String animationFile, long delay)
      Creates an animation from specifically .gif files, adds the created animation toDoaAnimations.ORIGINAL_ANIMATIONS, and returns the newly created animation.
      static DoaAnimation createAnimation​(java.lang.String animationName, java.util.List<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> keyframes, long delay)
      Creates an animation from a collection of DoaSprites, adds the created animation toDoaAnimations.ORIGINAL_ANIMATIONS, and returns the newly created animation.
      static DoaAnimation get​(java.lang.String animationName)
      Conveniency method.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • ORIGINAL_ANIMATIONS

        public static final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​DoaAnimation> ORIGINAL_ANIMATIONS
        Collection that maps animation names to animations.

      • SHADED_ANIMATIONS

        public static final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​DoaAnimation> SHADED_ANIMATIONS
        Collection that maps animation names to animations that are shaded according to the lights the scene has.

    • Method Detail

      • createAnimation

        public static DoaAnimation createAnimation​(java.lang.String animationName,
                                           java.lang.String animationFile,
                                           long delay)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Creates an animation from specifically .gif files, adds the created animation toDoaAnimations.ORIGINAL_ANIMATIONS, and returns the newly created animation.
        Parameters:
        animationName - name of the animation that will be created
        animationFile - path to the animation(.gif) on the disk
        delay - delay between each frame of animation in milliseconds
        Returns:
        the animation in DoaSprites.ORIGINAL_ANIMATIONS whose name is animationName
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if sprite cannot be loaded by DoaEngine

      • createAnimation

        public static DoaAnimation createAnimation​(java.lang.String animationName,
                                           java.util.List<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> keyframes,
                                           long delay)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Creates an animation from a collection of DoaSprites, adds the created animation toDoaAnimations.ORIGINAL_ANIMATIONS, and returns the newly created animation.
        Parameters:
        animationName - name of the animation that will be created
        keyframes - list that contains the frames of the animation
        delay - delay between each frame of animation in milliseconds
        Returns:
        the animation in DoaSprites.ORIGINAL_ANIMATIONS whose name is animationName
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if sprite cannot be loaded by DoaEngine

      • get

        public static DoaAnimation get​(java.lang.String animationName)
        Conveniency method. This method exists solely to reduce the amount of typing required while trying to retrieve an animation from DoaSprites class. Calling this method is equivalent to calling: DoaSprites.SHADED_ANIMATIONS.get(animationName);
        Parameters:
        animationName - name of the animation that is trying to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the sprite in DoaSprites.SHADED_ANIMATIONS whose name is spriteName
